system-page.name: najah2016
system-page.title: Zayed University shines at Najah Exhibition
system-page.summary: Zayed University's booth witnessed hundreds of young students, who familiarized themselves with current bachelor’s and master’s degree programs, which are on offer at the University during the first two days of Najah Education and Training Exhibition and Career Fair in the capital.

system-page.name: convo16
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates the annual convocation at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, inaugurated the annual convocation yesterday at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus under the theme of "Shaping the Future".

system-page.name: grad_80
system-page.title: Zayed University welcomes 80 students to join its graduate programs
system-page.summary: With the growing need for highly trained legal professionals in the UAE and other Gulf States, Zayed University opened its doors for 26 students who wish to hone their skills and acquire the knowledge and competencies necessary for successful handling and dealing with judicial administration.

system-page.name: ewd16
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates Emirati Women's Day
system-page.summary: In the presence of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance, President of Zayed University, Zayed University marked the occasion of the Emirati Women’s Day at Zayed University in Dubai campus, celebrating the achievements of influential Emirati women and their contributions to the growth of the nation.

system-page.name: nbonds
system-page.title: Zayed University and National Bonds sign MoU
system-page.summary: Zayed University established a new partnership with National Bonds Corporation (NBC), a leading sharia-compliant saving and investments company in the UAE, to enhance capabilities and provide hands-on and experiential learning to students related to major field of studies.

system-page.name: usds_visit
system-page.title: Zayed University welcomes U.S. Undersecretary of State for Public Diplomacy & Public Affairs Richard Stengel
system-page.summary: Zayed University recently welcomed Richard Stengel, U.S. Under-Secretary for Public Diplomacy and Public Affairs who delivered a lecture entitled: "Public Diplomacy and the role of Social Media" to Zayed University students.

system-page.name: adbf
system-page.title: Zayed University displays strong presence at the Abu Dhabi International Book Fair
system-page.summary: Zayed University displayed an impressive participation and strong presence at the Abu Dhabi International Book Fair held at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre (ADNEC) in the capital.

system-page.name: caceexpo
system-page.title: Sheikh Nahayan Bin Mabarak Al Nahayan and Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurate Zayed University CACE exhibition at Manarat Al Saadiyat
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Bin Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, and Her Excellency, Sheikha Lubna Bint Khaled Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President at Zayed University, inaugurated the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) exhibition for Zayed University senior students at Manarat Al Saadiyat on Tuesday evening in Abu Dhabi.

system-page.name: graduation_2016
system-page.title: His Highness Sheikh Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan attends Zayed University 2016 Graduation ceremony
system-page.summary: His Highness Sheikh Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan said: "The most fascinating success in life is when a person becomes a source of giving; for giving is not only material, but also spiritual and cognitive. To be able to put a smile on people’s faces, this means to teach them something new, renew their faith and strength to achieve what they need to attain."

system-page.name: globcom
system-page.title: Zayed University hosts the 14th annual Global Communication Conference in Abu Dhabi campus
system-page.summary: Zayed University kicked off the 14th annual Global Communication (GlobCom) conference yesterday at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus under the theme of “Building Global Communication Networks for a Cause”.

system-page.name: fables
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna awards winners of the first New Fairytales and Fables from the UAE Writing Competition
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, honored 11 creative winners in the first of its kind New Fairytales and Fables from the UAE Writing Competition (NF&F) at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: Sh_Latifa
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi honors Her Highness Sheikha Latifa Bint Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, honored Her Highness Sheikha Latifa Bint Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice Chairman of the Dubai Culture and Arts Authority and Honorary Chairman of the Zayed University Alumni Association Board, at Zayed University in Dubai campus on Monday in the presence of senior representatives, distinguished guests and ZU alumni.

system-page.name: alya
system-page.title: A Zayed University Alumna underscores an inspiring story of success
system-page.summary: Alya Alyassi, a successful young Emirati woman and Zayed University Alumna, returns back to teach at Zayed University with sincere love and unconditional loyalty to her home, from which she graduated with a Bachelor’s and Master’s Degrees in Communication and Media Sciences.

system-page.name: total
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with Total
system-page.summary: Zayed University, signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Total, the fourth largest global oil and gas company, at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus as part of its commitment to promote human capital development and build a knowledge sharing culture.

system-page.name: admaf
system-page.title: Zayed University student wins 2016 Gulf Capital ADMAF Creativity Award
system-page.summary: Abu Dhabi Music & Arts Foundation (ADMAF) has renewed its partnership with Gulf Capital, one of the largest and most active alternative investment firms in the Middle East, for the 5th year in a row to bring a series of cultural initiatives to the 13th edition of the Abu Dhabi Festival (3-30 April).

system-page.name: uqrs16
system-page.title: Sheikha Shamma Bint Sultan Bin Khalifa Al Nahyan inaugurates the second annual UAE Quantitative Research Symposium at Zayed University
system-page.summary: The second annual UAE Quantitative Research Symposium was inaugurated on Tuesday at Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus under the patronage and in the presence of ZU alumna, Sheikha Shamma Bint Sultan Bin Khalifa Al Nahyan.

system-page.name: marsh
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with Marsh to empower the Emirati workforce
system-page.summary: Zayed University and Marsh, a global leader in insurance broking and risk management, has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) at Zayed University in Dubai campus in the presence of Robert M. Makhoul, Executive Chairman of Marsh Middle East and North Africa and Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University.

system-page.name: zucf
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates the Climate Change Negotiation Forum at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, Climate Change Negotiation Forum ‘The Road from Paris’ commenced today (Wednesday) at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: honor_dist
system-page.title: Zayed University honors 533 distinguished students
system-page.summary: Zayed University (ZU) honored the achievements of 533 of its exceptional, dedicated, and outstanding students in an awarding ceremony held in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses to further reward students for their accomplishments and to encourage them to continue pursuing academic excellence.

system-page.name: wbank
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna welcomes World Bank President at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, received and welcomed Dr. Jim Yong Kim, President of the World Bank Group, at Zayed University, Dubai campus on Sunday.

system-page.name: nacada_n
system-page.title: Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb inaugurates NACADA conference at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, inaugurated NACADA conference, the Global Community of Academic Advising, which was held for the first time in Dubai campus on Tuesday.

system-page.name: imf
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi receives Christine Lagarde at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance, President of Zayed University received Madam Christine Lagarde, Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), and her distinguished accompanying delegation at Zayed University in Dubai campus.

system-page.name: shkaFatima
system-page.title: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak receives Her Excellency Lubna Al Qasimi and Zayed University delegation
system-page.summary: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak, Chairwoman of the General Women's Union (GWU), Supreme Chairwoman of the Family Development Foundation (FDF) and President of the Supreme Council for Motherhood and Childhood, received Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University. Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna was accompanied by a group of academic and administrative women professionals at Zayed University.

system-page.name: orient16
system-page.title: Zayed University organizes Orientation Days for new students
system-page.summary: Zayed University welcomed a total of 191 prospective students on both its campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai this week in a two-day orientation program that aims to introduce them and their parents to Zayed University's student life and provide them with the useful academic information needed for them to smoothly transition to Zayed University's new and exciting academic and cultural setting and commence their educational journey successfully on January 17.

system-page.name: latin
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna meets the Latin American and Caribbean Group delegation at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi , Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, received a visiting delegation from the Latin American and Caribbean Group (Grulac), under the chairmanship of His Excellency Roberto Leon Ramirez, who is leading a six-country delegation in response to FNC’s official invitation, at Zayed University- Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: anatomy
system-page.title: Zayed University holds a lecture on "The Anatomy of Innovation"
system-page.summary: Zayed University recently organized a lecture entitled “The Anatomy of Innovation” on its Abu Dhabi campus, and delivered by Dr. Kamiel Gabriel. Dr. Gabriel holds a Bachelor of Science, and a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Alexandria in Egypt, and a Ph.D. degree from the University of Manitoba in Canada. He also holds a diploma in Space Science from the International Space University in France, and an M.B.A. from the Edwards School of Business, University of Saskatchewan in Canada.

system-page.name: ssf
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with the Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund
system-page.summary: Zayed University and Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) at Zayed University headquarters in Abu Dhabi in the presence of His Excellency Salem Saeed AlKhatheri, Chairman of Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund, and Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University.

system-page.name: zuappre
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi Awards 100 Prominent Partners in Excellence
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, stressed that Zayed University is proud of its achievements during the last two decades under our rightful leadership and its sound guidance and continuous support.

system-page.name: flagday15
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Flag Day
system-page.summary: Coinciding with the anniversary of President His Highness Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan's assumption of office as the leader of the country, Zayed University (ZU) celebrated the UAE Flag Day yesterday (Tuesday) on both its campuses in Dubai and Abu Dhabi.

system-page.name: innovWeek15
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Innovation Week
system-page.summary: As part of the UAE's National Innovation Strategy launched in October last year by His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice- President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai, Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, inaugurated the UAE Innovation Week 2015 in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses on Sunday.

system-page.name: sets
system-page.title: Zayed University introduces its first Student Engagement, Training and Service Learning Day
system-page.summary: A variety of programs and supports aimed at augmenting the student experiences were offered during the first Student Engagement, Training and Service Learning (SETS) event that was recently held at Zayed University (ZU) in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses.

system-page.name: uog
system-page.title: Zayed University signs a MoU with the University of Geneva
system-page.summary: In recognition of the importance of exchanges in the field of research, Zayed University signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the University of Geneva in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: wcd15
system-page.title: Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb inaugurates the Fifth International White Cane Day at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Zayed University has celebrated the Fifth International White Cane Day at Abu Dhabi campus under the slogan By insight or by cane, my mobility I gain.

system-page.name: sap15
system-page.title: Zayed University Signs a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with SAP to give their Students an advanced technology skillset and competitive edge
system-page.summary: Zayed University students will gain advanced technology skillset and competitive edge by gaining theoretical and practical knowledge in SAP technology and workplace experience before graduation, thanks to a partnership announced by Zayed University and SAP.

system-page.name: najah15
system-page.title: Zayed University attracts a large audience at Najah Exhibition
system-page.summary: Zayed University's booth attracted a large number of prospective high school graduates, who are pursuing higher studies and thousands of fresh graduates looking for jobs on the first day of Najah exhibition held in the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Center (Adnec) between 27 and 29 October 2015.

system-page.name: womensday
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates Emirati Women's Day with pride
system-page.summary: In efforts to pay rich tribute to the achievements scored by Emirati women, Zayed University has organized a one-day event to honor and recognize their influential participation and enormous contributions in Dubai campus on Sunday. The Student Life Department at Zayed University has organized an open day discussion to highlight several topics such as, women empowerment in the UAE, the political role that Emirati women play and their positive participation in the Federal National Council 2015 elections, employment preparation and future career opportunities.

system-page.name: mouState
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with the UAE State Audit Institution
system-page.summary: Zayed University and the UAE State Audit Institution (SAI) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) aimed at attracting and empowering UAE national cadres of talented young graduates from ZU.

system-page.name: convo15
system-page.title: Zayed University Convocation 2015
system-page.summary: Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, ,Minister of International Cooperation and Development, and President of Zayed University (ZU), extended with great sadness and pride her sincere condolences to the Government and the people of the UAE for the martyrdom of champions in the Armed Forces in Yemen.

system-page.name: new_students
system-page.title: 1928 new students begin classes at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Around 1928 new students started classes today (Sunday) at Zayed University in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai Campuses. Zayed University (ZU) has earlier welcomed new students in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses during the academic orientation week event that was held on August 19 and 20 last week.

system-page.name: zu_partners_adtc
system-page.title: Zayed University partners with Abu Dhabi Tawteen Council
system-page.summary: Zayed University (ZU) has partnered with Abu Dhabi Tawteen Council (ADTC) to launch the first phase of a new online manpower system, which will assist new Emirati graduates match their skill-sets to jobs in the Abu Dhabi labor market.

system-page.name: kaabi
system-page.title: H.E Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi and Ali Al Kaabi attend MoU signing ceremony at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khaled Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development and President of Zayed University (ZU), and Ali Bin Salim Al Kaabi, Chairman of the Board of Trustees at the Family Development Foundation (FDF), attended a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) signing ceremony that was held at ZU’s Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: unitar
system-page.title: Zayed University signs a MoU with the United Nations Institute for Training and Research
system-page.summary: In a major step aimed at strengthening relations between Zayed University (ZU), the United Nations and the private sector, Zayed University signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the United Nations Institute for Training and Research (UNITAR) at Abu Dhabi campus recently.

system-page.name: emfoundation
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with Emirates Foundation
system-page.summary: Zayed University (ZU) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Emirates Foundation, in a major step aimed at implementing key priorities of the UAE Government’s strategy that focuses on youth development in the country.

system-page.name: stigma
system-page.title: Zayed University aims to stop the stigma of mental illness
system-page.summary: With one in four people struggling with mental health problems at least once in their lifetime according to statistics released by the World Health Organization (WHO), Zayed University (ZU) held an event in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses under the slogan of “Stop the Stigma of Mental Illness,” to raise mental health awareness.

system-page.name: ccmsacc
system-page.title: College of Communication and Media Sciences earns a prestigious international accreditation
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, President of Zayed University and Minister of International Cooperation and Development, affirmed Zayed University’s keenness to continue pursuing excellence and distinction in both academic and administrative levels.

system-page.name: grad2015
system-page.title: Zayed University Graduation 2015
system-page.summary: Under the patronage of H.H. Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Presidential Affairs, H.H. Sheikh Dhiyab bin Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan attended the graduation ceremony of the 13th batch of BA female students and the third batch of the male BA students of Zayed University (ZU) at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre last night.

system-page.name: scott
system-page.title: H.E Humza Yousaf, Scotland's Minister for Europe and International Development, visits Zayed University
system-page.summary: His Excellency Humza Yousaf, Scotland's Minister for Europe and International Development, recently met with Zayed University students on Dubai campus.

system-page.name: mara
system-page.title: Zayed University discusses ways of cooperation with the University Technology MARA
system-page.summary: Zayed University has welcomed the Malaysian delegation from the University Technology MARA Kelantan in Dubai campus recently to discuss ways of cooperation in the field of business, social enterprises and Islamic Studies.

system-page.name: slfg15
system-page.title: H.H Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak attends graduation ceremony of 296 ZU, UAEU and HCT female students
system-page.summary: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak, Chairwoman of the General Women's Union (GWU), Supreme Chairwoman of the Family Development Foundation (FDF) and President of the Supreme Council for Motherhood and Childhood, attended the graduation ceremony of 296 female students of Zayed University, UAE University, and Higher Colleges of Technology in the presence of official representatives of ministries, FNC members and women leaders.

system-page.name: careers15
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates ZU's Careers Spotlight in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, has inaugurated Zayed University’s annual Careers Spotlight on Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: acad
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi engages in effective academic conversations with 1200 students
system-page.summary: In an attempt to target and guide students who have not yet chosen their university majors, Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, inaugurated an open day recently at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses.

system-page.name: action15
system-page.title: A total of 800 Zayed University students aim to raise Dh100,000 for underprivileged refugees
system-page.summary: In an effort to encourage young Emiratis to become more socially responsible, a total of 800 students along with Zayed University faculty and staff were engaged in a service-learning project that aims to ease Syrian and Palestinian refugees’ burden on Monday on Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus. Action 2015 is a co-curricular project based on the ABP’s curriculum that has a focus on the topic of Humanitarian Aid. The aim of this service-learning project is for students, male and female, to further understand what a humanitarian crisis is and how they can by providing humanitarian relief where it is needed most.

system-page.name: memzaah
system-page.title: Zayed University hosts a lecture focuses on true understanding of Islam
system-page.summary: With an aim to establish a true awareness of Islam and warn young Emiratis against potential dangers hidden behind extremist and terrorist groups, Zayed University hosted a lecture led by Al-Mezmaah Studies and Research Center recently in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: zusc15
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi meets with Zayed University Student Council
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University (ZU) highlighted that providing an ideal academic environment is significant to help students achieving academic excellence and be productive members of the Emirati society.

system-page.name: majors
system-page.title: Zayed University organizes a Majors Day on Abu Dhabi campus
system-page.summary:
Zayed University kicked off its Majors Day at Abu Dhabi campus in a successful attempt to help freshman feel more comfortable with decisions pertaining to their chosen major.
The Department of Advising and Academic Development at Zayed University organized a one-day event, which saw various colleges, advisors and students, who seek to explore majors, meet with undergraduate studies advisors and set up informational interviews with their consultants.

system-page.name: jap15
system-page.title: Zayed University student wins first place in the Japanese Speech Contest
system-page.summary: Aisha Essa Al Ali, a sophomore student at the College of Humanities and Social Sciences in Zayed University, won the first place in the Japanese speech contest recently.

system-page.name: htv
system-page.title: Zayed University students collect donations for human trafficking victims
system-page.summary: Three Zayed University students launched a charity initiative to provide human trafficking victims at Ewa’a Shelter with the highest quality of rehabilitative and reintegration services, as part of their business communication course at Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: usdeleg
system-page.title: US delegation visits Zayed University
system-page.summary: A delegation of teachers and members of the World Affairs Council (WAC) of Dallas/ Fort Worth visited Zayed University on Monday to gain better understanding of the UAE during a study tour.

system-page.name: action2015
system-page.title: Zayed University's Action 2015 raises Dh107,000 to alleviate the suffering of Syrian and Palestinian refugees
system-page.summary: A total of Dh107,000 was raised from Action project to alleviate the suffering and provide relief for Syrian and Palestinian refugees. The announcement came during an event held on Wednesday at Zayed University, Abu Dhabi campus with the attendance of hundreds of students and faculty members.

system-page.name: admaf15
system-page.title: Gulf Capital-ADMAF Creativity Award 2015 Honours Young Emirati Artists as Part of Abu Dhabi Festival's Community & Education Programme
system-page.summary: In support of Abu Dhabi Music & Arts Foundation’s (ADMAF) commitment to education, the Gulf Capital-ADMAF Creativity Award 2015 yesterday honoured young Emirati talent at the Majlis of H.E. Sheikh Nahyan Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Culture, Youth & Community Development, ADMAF Patron and President.

system-page.name: hamc
system-page.title: Sheikha Latifa Bint Hamdan Al Maktoum Center opens at Zayed University for students activities
system-page.summary: Sheikha Latifa Bint Hamdan Al Maktoum inaugurated the Sheikha Latifa Bint Hamdan Al Maktoum Center for students activities on Zayed University's Dubai campus recently, following the agreement sealed between Zayed University and Al Maktoum Foundation last May.

system-page.name: zuf15
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates Zayed University Festival
system-page.summary: In efforts to encourage and activate women’s participation in economic development, Zayed University has organized its annual festival in Abu Dhabi campus. Zayed University female students and graduates showcased their talents and exceptional entrepreneurship skills through artistic, cultural and entertainment activities at the annual Zayed University festival.

system-page.name: pol
system-page.title: Polish Ambassador visits Zayed University in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: His Excellency Dr. Adam Kachimovski, Poland’s Ambassador the UAE, recently visited Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus, where he met with Prof. Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, to discuss ways of activating and promoting academic and cultural cooperation between Poland and the UAE.

system-page.name: earth
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates Earth Hour
system-page.summary: In an effort to promote the concept of sustaining rational consumption decisions throughout our daily lives and in support of action on climate change, Zayed University celebrated the Earth Hour by turning off the lights in Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses on Saturday evening.

system-page.name: DWE
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with Dubai Women Establishment
system-page.summary: In order to strengthen the cooperation and strategic partnership between the two parties, Zayed University and Dubai Women Establishment recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU), with the sole objective to unite their efforts in boosting the participation of UAE national women and help them to achieve personal and professional developmental goals.

system-page.name: matrix
system-page.title: ZU's Student Careers Office maintains the "Matrix Standard" accreditation for the third consecutive year
system-page.summary: Zayed University’s Student Careers Office has successfully maintained the “Matrix Standard” accreditation for the third consecutive year, which reiterates the University’s commitment to assure continuous improvements in the services provided to its students amongst other stakeholders.

system-page.name: dumulti
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates Zayed University's du multimedia lab in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: In order to strengthen the cooperation and strategic partnership between the two parties, Zayed University and Dubai Women Establishment recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU), with the sole objective to unite their efforts in boosting the participation of UAE national women and help them to achieve personal and professional developmental goals.

system-page.name: ucm15
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi chairs Zayed University Council meeting
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, emphasized during the University Council meeting that was held in Abu Dhabi, that Zayed University is keen to invest its best efforts to ensure that the new generation of students and young cadres are well prepared to keep up with the latest developments through providing them with the best means for ambitious plans that help them realize their academic and professional objectives and enhance their productivity using the latest technology and e-learning methods.

system-page.name: leaders
system-page.title: Her Exellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi Sponsors the Second "Think Zayed Women Leadership Forum" at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, asserted, in a speech addressing Zayed University students during the “Second Think Zayed Women Leadership Forum at Zayed University,” that the invaluable support of the UAE’s visionary leaders, and their continuous encouragement to women has greatly participated in the rise of women’s leadership roles across the nation.

system-page.name: award
system-page.title: Zayed University students win most of the awards in the "Human Rights Short Film" competition
system-page.summary: Zayed University’s College of Communication and Media Sciences students won five of nine awards at the Human Rights Short Film Competition launched by the Community Development Authority this year, under the title “Child’s Rights.” The competition’s final round included 42 participants, including both male and female university students from across the country.

system-page.name: alum14
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates its second annual Alumni Reunion
system-page.summary: n the presence, and under the patronage of Her Highness Sheikha Salama bint Hamdan Al Nahyan, Spouse of His Highness General Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi and Deputy Supreme Commander of the UAE Armed Forces, and in the presence of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, the Alumni Office at Zayed University held its second “Annual Alumni Reunion” to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the graduation of the second batch (2003/2004).

system-page.name: ISEA2014
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates ISEA2014
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurated the International Symposium on Electronic Art (ISEA2014) on Zayed University’s Dubai Campus, in line with the national initiative promoting “innovation” strategies that His Highness Sheikh Mohammad Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, UAE Vice President, Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai, had launched earlier last month, in an attempt to position the UAE amongst the world’s most innovative countries in the next 7 years.

system-page.name: wcd2014
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the Fourth International White Cane Day
system-page.summary: Prof. Reyadh AlMehaideb, Zayed University’s Vice President, inaugurated the Fourth International Annual White Cane Day which was organized by ZU’s Office of Accessibility on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. The event witnessed a large participation from a number of public figures, and Zayed University students, faculty and staff.

system-page.name: convo14

system-page.name: zscholars

system-page.name: govsummit

Her Excellency Dr. Maitha Al Shamsi, Minister of State and president of Zayed University thanked the ongoing support of His Highness Sheikh Mansoor bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Presidential Affairs, and shed light on the absolute commitment of Zayed University to provide students with a healthy environment that enables them to take initiatives, grab opportunities, and become active contributors in the development of the nation.

system-page.name: kfund

system-page.name: flagday

system-page.name: coeAcrreditation

system-page.name: convo13

Dr. Maitha AlShamsi, Minister of State and President of Zayed University praised the tremendous progress the university has made since its founding in 1998. During her address, H.E. Dr. Al Shamsi pointed the tremendous achievements the university has made in terms of academic recognition, services provided, and contributions to disseminate knowledge and education, in its short life span.

September 10, 2013.

The conference aimed to inspire, educate and encourage female ZU students to become future global leaders in the United Arab Emirates and the broader Gulf Cooperation Council countries. It also provided students with an opportunity to connect with distinguished UAE business and to learn from their experiences.

system-page.name: sharjP

His Highness presented to Zayed University’s VP a memorable shield to mark Zayed University’s continuous support and tremendous multi-cultural and educational contributions.

system-page.name: hon2013

system-page.name: HMV

The two-day conference attracts many international speakers and health care professionals, representative from several hospitals and clinics dealing with hearing impairment, UAE & GCC Deaf Associations and the UAE Deaf community.

system-page.name: GhafarChair

system-page.name: DGHRA

system-page.name: emam

system-page.summary: The Grand Imam of Al-Azhar Dr. Ahmed Al Tayyeb said Zayed University has the adequate resources to make a scientific, academic and cultural breakthrough in the UAE.

system-page.name: zumeff13

system-page.summary: Zayed University will officially launch the UAE National Film Library and Archive (UNFLA) today, under the patronage and in the presence of His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture, Youth and Community Development. The first of its kind in the Gulf, the archive will be a permanent home for the work of Emirati funded and made films for generations to come.

system-page.name: syRRef

system-page.name: ukaccredited

This followed an external assessment process undertaken by emqc Ltd, the organization responsible for the management, administration and delivery of the matrix Standard. This award highlights Zayed University’s continued commitment to deliver career programs and services that meet internationally recognized quality standards.

system-page.name: cs2013

system-page.name: carnival

system-page.name: sheikh_mansoor

system-page.name: stamp

system-page.name: lestWe

system-page.name: classicCar

system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture, Youth and Community Development, President of Zayed University, inaugurated the classic cars’ exhibition that was organized by Zayed University’s French Club students, as part of the annual francophone celebrations. His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan toured around the exhibition that was held on Abu Dhabi campus, accompanied by HE Ahmad Humaid Al Tayer, HE Khaldoon Al Mubarak, Dr. Maryam Al Rumaithi, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, and Dr. Larry Wilson. The exhibition showcased very rare and valuable cars that were produced in the 1920s.

system-page.name: naspa2013

The conference was held in association with Student Affairs Administrators in Higher Education (NASPA), a leading association for the advancement, health, and sustainability of the student affairs profession, and American College Personnel Association (ACPA), and attracted 150 student administrators from the GCC and international universities.

system-page.name: aussStudents

system-page.name: pcRide

system-page.name: autism
system-page.title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan oversees the strategies and programs of the Dubai Autism Center
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, praised the efforts of the employees and specialists working at the Dubai Autism Center, which offers various services targeted towards encouraging a better understanding of Autism and providing specialist services for people with Autism and those who care for them.

system-page.name: labour
system-page.title: Zayed University honors laborers working on its campuses
system-page.summary: In support of the “Thank You” initiative launched across the UAE by His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashed Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai, to present thanks and appreciation to laborers working in public services, Zayed University organized a ceremony in the honor of laborers working on its campuses, where Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, praised the valuable work that laborers are committing to and their genuine contribution to the betterment of the society.

system-page.name: GC2013
system-page.title: Zayed University's Student Council in Abu Dhabi honors the UAE National Football team
system-page.summary: Zayed University’s Student Council in Abu Dhabi honored the UAE National Football team this morning on the occasion of winning the 21st Gulf Cup, which was held in Bahrain recently. A celebration was held on Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus to acknowledge this great achievement in the presence of players Ismail Matar and Hamdan Al Kamali.

system-page.name: graduates_2012
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates the graduation of its 11th cohort
system-page.summary: Zayed University celebrated the graduation of its 11th cohort last Thursday December 6, 2012 on the new Abu Dhabi campus, where His Highness Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, handed 890 graduates their diplomas in the presence of Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Dr. Larry Wilson , Provost of Zayed University, and a number of faculty and staff members and families of the graduates.

system-page.name: cam2012
system-page.title: British Prime Minister David Cameron visits Zayed University Campus in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: H.E Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, welcomed British Prime Minister David Cameron to Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi Campus yesterday. Also present were Sheikh Shakhbout bin Nahyan Al Nahyan, Dr. Anwar Mohammed Gargash, Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, Dominic Jermey, the British Ambassador to the UAE, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Dr. Larry Wilson, Provost of Zayed University, and a number of officials, Zayed University faculty and students.

system-page.name: councilmeet
system-page.title: Zayed University Council meets under the chairmanship of H.E Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan
system-page.summary: Zayed University Council held a meeting this morning under the chairmanship of His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research President of Zayed University, and in the presence of the council members Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, and Dr. Larry Wilson, Provost of Zayed University.

system-page.name: swiss
system-page.title: H.E Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan inaugurates the 3rd Emirati-Swiss Friendship Forum
system-page.summary: Leading experts from the UAE and Switzerland were brought together at Zayed University Abu Dhabi, by the third meeting of Emirati-Swiss Friendship Forum, which saw participants debate on issues related to water sustainability.

system-page.name: ial
system-page.title: Zayed University's Institute for the Arabic Language offers new academic programs
system-page.summary: Zayed University announced yesterday the new academic programs that are offered through the Institute for the Arabic Language. The initiative comes from the continuous effort by the University to advance the leadership role it plays in supporting the Arabic Language and strengthen its position to tackle the challenges the language faces in this globalized era.

system-page.name: ravi
system-page.title: Ravi Zacharias visits Zayed University Campus in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: Ravi Zackarias lectured to Zayed University administrators, guests, faculty, staff and students on November 26 in the Sheikha Fatima Theater in the Convention Center.

system-page.name: Nd2012
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE's 41st National Day
system-page.summary: Zayed University’s campuses in both Dubai and Abu Dhabi dedicated Wednesday the 28th and Thursday the 29th of November 2012 to offer thanks and gratitude for 41 years of unity in the UAE.

system-page.name: coord
system-page.title: H.E Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan chairs the first meeting of the Higher Education Coordinating Council
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, chaired the first meeting of the Higher Education Coordinating Council at Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus earlier today. Amongst the attendees were Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Dr. Ali Rashid Al Noaimi, Vice Chancellor of UAEU, and Dr. Tayyib Kamali, Vice Chancellor of the Higher Colleges of Technology (HCT).

system-page.name: convocation_2012
system-page.title: Zayed University hosts its 15th Annual Convocation in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University reflected on the various components that will leverage Zayed University’s position amongst Top international education institutions,

system-page.name: mou_unb
system-page.title: Zayed University signs an endowment agreement with Union National Bank to create a Union National Bank Professorship in Banking
system-page.summary: Union National Bank, signed an Endowment Agreement with Zayed University to establish a Professorship at Zayed University titled "Union National Bank Professorship in Banking". UNB will contribute an amount of Five Million Dirhams over a period of five years to establish this Professorship in Banking.

system-page.name: wcd2012
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the Third International White Cane Day
system-page.summary: Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Zayed University's Vice President, inaugurated the Third International Annual White Cane Day at Zayed University’s Dubai Campus on October 14, 2012. This event organized by the Office of Accessibility, in the presence of Dr. Larry Wilson, Zayed University’s Provost, and a number of public figures, and Zayed University students, faculty and staff.

system-page.name: ipad_initiative
system-page.title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Attends The iPad Executive Briefing at Zayed University
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education& Scientific Research, President of Zayed University,‬ stated that e-learning tops the priority list of the UAE education development strategy, especially in light of the National initiative to distribute 14,000 iPads amongst new students enrolled in Zayed University, UAEU and HCT.‬

system-page.name: hellou
system-page.title: HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement on setting up Obaid Al Helu Professorship in Islamic Jurisprudence at Zayed University
system-page.summary:
HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement on setting up Obaid Al Helu Professorship in Islamic Jurisprudence at the Islamic World Studies Institute at Zayed University, at the residence of Al Hellou in Dubai.
Present were Ahmed Humaid Al Tayer, Head of the Supervising Committee over the endowment fund at Zayed University, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Safia Al Raqbani, Chief Development and External Affairs Officer, and other dignitaries.

system-page.name: binHam
system-page.title: HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement to set up Sheikh Salem bin Ham Al Amri Professorship in Islamic Legal Theory at Zayed University
system-page.summary:
HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement to set up Sheikh Salem bin Ham Al Amri Professorship in Islamic Legal Theory at Zayed University.
Present were Ahmed Humaid Al Tayer, Head of the Supervising Committee over the endowment fund at Zayed University, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Safia Al Raqbani, Chief Development and External Affairs Officer, and other officials.

system-page.name: siddiqi
system-page.title: HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement to set up the Ahmad Seddiqi Professorship in Arabic language at Zayed University
system-page.summary:
HE Sheikh Nahayan signs agreement to set up the Ahmad Seddiqi Professorship in Arabic language at Zayed University.
H.E Sheikh Nahayan signed the agreement with Abdul Hameed Ahmad Siddiqi, who was representing Ahmad Siddiqi and Sons.

system-page.name: french
system-page.title: French Book Donation to Zayed University
system-page.summary: Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice-President of Zayed University, praised the collaboration with the cultural, educational and scientific institutions in France, expressing his hope that this collaboration will enhance opportunities for scientific and cultural exchange between Zayed University and those institutions.

system-page.name: alumni2012
system-page.title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan attends the first Zayed University Alumni Reunion
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, recently attended the Zayed University Alumni Reunion in celebration of the 10th Graduation Anniversary of the first Zayed University Cohort 2002 in the new Abu Dhabi Campus.

system-page.name: amf2012
system-page.title: ZU Vice President actively contributes to the Arab Media Forum 2012
system-page.summary: Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, took part in the 11th Edition of the Arab Media Forum 2012, which was held under the Patronage and in the Presence of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashed Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai.

system-page.name: sculpt
system-page.title: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan inaugurates Sculpture Exhibition "Jothoor & Shumookh"
system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, inaugurated Zayed Univeristy Abu Dhabi’s suculpture exhibition, entitled “ Jothoor and Shumookh”, and presented by the Saudi artist Abdul- Hafez bin Jamah Al-Ghamdi.

system-page.name: khalaf
system-page.title: Zayed University inaugurates the "Khalaf Al Habtoor Assistive Technology Resource Center"
system-page.summary: H.E. Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University inaugurated the “Khalaf Al Habtoor Assistive Technology Resource Center” for students with special needs at Zayed University Dubai Campus during the launch ceremony held in the presence of Khalaf Al Habtoor, the founder of Al Habtoor Group of Companies, Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President, Zayed University, Dr. Larry Wilson, Provost Zayed University, Safia Al Raqbani, Chief Development and External Affairs Officer, faculty, staff and public figures.

system-page.name: GETEX12
system-page.title: Zayed University offers new Programs at GETEX 2012
system-page.summary: During the opening of Gulf Education & Training Exhibition “GETEX 2012” that is held Under the Patronage of His Excellency Sheikh Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Higher, Education and Scientific Research, President of Zayed University, the Zayed University’s booth participating in the exhibition introduces new programs that are offered for the first time this year.

system-page.name: owais
system-page.title: Humaid Bin Nasser Al Owais Establishes an Endowed Professorship in Arabic Language for AED 5 Million
system-page.summary: H.E. Humaid Bin Nasser Al Owais, the Former UAE Minister of Electricity and Water, made a donation of AED 5 Million for the first endowed professorship in Arabic language. The Humaid Bin Nasser Al Owais Professorship in Arabic Language will make it possible for a scholar to focus on topics related to the Arabic language.

system-page.name: zu_carnival_2012
system-page.title: His Highness Sheikh Majid Bin Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum inaugurates Zayed University Carnival
system-page.summary: His Highness Sheikh Majid bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Chairman of Dubai Culture and Arts inaugurated the "Zayed University Carnival 2012” at the University’s campus in Dubai on March 6, 2012.

system-page.title: H.E. Sheikh Nahayan Mabarak Al Nahayan inaugurates the 4th "Women as Global Leaders" conference 2012

system-page.name: ZEIN
system-page.title: Zayed Environmental launch the Global Environmental Salon Consume Wisely
system-page.summary: Zayed Environmental Impact Network (ZEIN) in collaboration with 350.org will launch the “Global Environmental Salon” under the banner of “Consume Wisely” on 10.10.2010 at Zayed University, Dubai, UAE. The event follows on from the successful environmental sustainability exhibition organized by ZEIN in May 2010.

system-page.name: semster2011
system-page.title: Zayed University Organizes Orientation For New Students
system-page.summary: Zayed University is organizing new student orientation in Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses. The 4-day orientation will start on September 13 and is expecting 2252 male and female students.

system-page.name: international-colg
system-page.title: Zayed University Launches The “International College” in Abu Dhabi and Dubai in The New Academic Year
system-page.summary: Zayed University is currently working on the launch of the “International College” in the new academic year, a first of its kind initiative in this region. The college will start its first classes in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses in the academic year 2010-2011.
system-page.teaser: Attracts students from over the world

system-page.name: students_research_skills
system-page.title: Zayed University Initiates a New Program to Develop Student Research Skills
system-page.summary: Zayed University initiated a new program, The Undergraduate Research Scholars Program (ZU URSP), to support undergraduate students develop their research skills.

system-page.name: Uni_Marylen
system-page.title: University of Maryland visit Zayed University
system-page.summary: A delegation from the University of Maryland visited Zayed University in Dubai as part of their visit to the United Arab Emirates. Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Dr. Bob Cryan, Associate Provost-Academic and International Affairs, and Zayed University senior administrators met with the delegation G. 'Anand' Anandalingam, Dean of the University of Maryland Robert H. Smith School of Business, Hugh Courtney, Associate Dean of Executive Programs and Professor of the Practice of Strategy at the University of Maryland’s Robert H. Smith School of Business, Amir Farmanesh, Governance economist with the World Bank Governance Group - Policy fellow with the U.S. National Academy of Sciences, Tom Kennedy, Director of the Office of Executive Programs at the University of Maryland School of Public Policy, and William L. Powers, Executive Dean of the University of Maryland School of Public Policy.

system-page.name: GEM
system-page.title: Zayed University Launched Global Entrepreneurship Monitor Report on Entrepreneurship in the United Arab Emirates
system-page.summary: Zayed University launched the 2009 Global Entrepreneurship Monitor (GEM) report on entrepreneurship in the United Arab Emirates which was prepared by Zayed University experts in collaboration with Khalifa Fund for Enterprise Development and Mohammed Bin Rashid Establishment for Small and Medium Enterprises (SME). The GEM report was created with the objective to collect relevant harmonized data on an annual basis from different countries and to bring together academics from all over the world to work on a common research program. 42 countries are participating in this research activity and this is the third participation for the UAE.

system-page.name: conclude program

system-page.name: NewUndergraduate
system-page.title: Zayed University Offers New Undergraduate and Graduate Majors
system-page.summary: Zayed University is currently preparing to open new majors for undergraduate and graduate degrees in the next academic year 2010-2011, which will begin on 19 September. The new majors include Master of Arts in Diplomacy and International Studies in the College of Arts and Sciences, Bachelor of Arts in Emirati Studies in the College of Arts and Sciences joint with the College of Communications and Media Sciences, and Bachelor of Science in Multimedia Design in the College of Information Technology joint with the College of Communications and Media Sciences and College of Arts and Sciences.
system-page.teaser: New majors in the next academic year

system-page.name: library_training

system-page.summary: The second cohort of Madares Al Ghad School librarians graduated from the Zayed University's School Librarian Training Program. The program is in collaboration with the Ministry of Education to raise performance of library professionals in different education sectors. The graduation ceremony was attended by Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Zayed University faculty and staff, and members from the Ministry.
system-page.teaser: In collaboration of the Minister of Education

system-page.summary: Under the patronage and presence of Dr. Sulaiman Al Jassim, Vice President of Zayed University, Zayed University organized an appreciation ceremony for media specialists from various fields of the media who have cooperated in covering the events and activities of Zayed University in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. The ceremony was also attended by a number of faculty and staff of Zayed University.
system-page.teaser: As a thank you for their support

system-page.name: summer_training
system-page.title: Zayed University inaugurates the World of Work Summer Employment Program
system-page.summary: Zayed University inaugurated its “World of Work” (WOW) summer employment program in its Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses. The program prepares students who are willing to work in different organizations during the summer holidays. system-page.name: action15

Action 2015 is a co-curricular project based on the ABP’s curriculum that has a focus on the topic of Humanitarian Aid. The aim of this service-learning project is for students, male and female, to further understand what a humanitarian crisis is and how they can by providing humanitarian relief where it is needed most.

system-page.name: new_students
system-page.title: 1928 new students begin classes at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Around 1928 new students started classes today (Sunday) at Zayed University in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai Campuses. Zayed University (ZU) has earlier welcomed new students in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses during the academic orientation week event that was held on August 19 and 20 last week.

system-page.name: womensday
system-page.title: Zayed University celebrates Emirati Women's Day with pride
system-page.summary: In efforts to pay rich tribute to the achievements scored by Emirati women, Zayed University has organized a one-day event to honor and recognize their influential participation and enormous contributions in Dubai campus on Sunday. The Student Life Department at Zayed University has organized an open day discussion to highlight several topics such as, women empowerment in the UAE, the political role that Emirati women play and their positive participation in the Federal National Council 2015 elections, employment preparation and future career opportunities.

system-page.name: convo15
system-page.title: Zayed University Convocation 2015
system-page.summary: Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, ,Minister of International Cooperation and Development, and President of Zayed University (ZU), extended with great sadness and pride her sincere condolences to the Government and the people of the UAE for the martyrdom of champions in the Armed Forces in Yemen.

system-page.name: sets
system-page.title: Zayed University introduces its first Student Engagement, Training and Service Learning Day
system-page.summary: A variety of programs and supports aimed at augmenting the student experiences were offered during the first Student Engagement, Training and Service Learning (SETS) event that was recently held at Zayed University (ZU) in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses.

system-page.name: uog
system-page.title: Zayed University signs a MoU with the University of Geneva
system-page.summary: In recognition of the importance of exchanges in the field of research, Zayed University signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the University of Geneva in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: wcd15
system-page.title: Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb inaugurates the Fifth International White Cane Day at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Zayed University has celebrated the Fifth International White Cane Day at Abu Dhabi campus under the slogan By insight or by cane, my mobility I gain.

system-page.name: sap15
system-page.title: Zayed University Signs a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with SAP to give their Students an advanced technology skillset and competitive edge
system-page.summary: Zayed University students will gain advanced technology skillset and competitive edge by gaining theoretical and practical knowledge in SAP technology and workplace experience before graduation, thanks to a partnership announced by Zayed University and SAP.

system-page.name: najah15
system-page.title: Zayed University attracts a large audience at Najah Exhibition
system-page.summary: Zayed University's booth attracted a large number of prospective high school graduates, who are pursuing higher studies and thousands of fresh graduates looking for jobs on the first day of Najah exhibition held in the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Center (Adnec) between 27 and 29 October 2015.

system-page.name: flagday15
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Flag Day
system-page.summary: Coinciding with the anniversary of President His Highness Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan's assumption of office as the leader of the country, Zayed University (ZU) celebrated the UAE Flag Day yesterday (Tuesday) on both its campuses in Dubai and Abu Dhabi.

system-page.name: innovWeek15
system-page.title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Innovation Week
system-page.summary: As part of the UAE's National Innovation Strategy launched in October last year by His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice- President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai, Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, inaugurated the UAE Innovation Week 2015 in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses on Sunday.

system-page.name: zuappre
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi Awards 100 Prominent Partners in Excellence
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, stressed that Zayed University is proud of its achievements during the last two decades under our rightful leadership and its sound guidance and continuous support.

system-page.name: orient16
system-page.title: Zayed University organizes Orientation Days for new students
system-page.summary: Zayed University welcomed a total of 191 prospective students on both its campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai this week in a two-day orientation program that aims to introduce them and their parents to Zayed University's student life and provide them with the useful academic information needed for them to smoothly transition to Zayed University's new and exciting academic and cultural setting and commence their educational journey successfully on January 17.

system-page.name: latin
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna meets the Latin American and Caribbean Group delegation at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi , Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, received a visiting delegation from the Latin American and Caribbean Group (Grulac), under the chairmanship of His Excellency Roberto Leon Ramirez, who is leading a six-country delegation in response to FNC’s official invitation, at Zayed University- Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: anatomy
system-page.title: Zayed University holds a lecture on "The Anatomy of Innovation"
system-page.summary: Zayed University recently organized a lecture entitled “The Anatomy of Innovation” on its Abu Dhabi campus, and delivered by Dr. Kamiel Gabriel. Dr. Gabriel holds a Bachelor of Science, and a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Alexandria in Egypt, and a Ph.D. degree from the University of Manitoba in Canada. He also holds a diploma in Space Science from the International Space University in France, and an M.B.A. from the Edwards School of Business, University of Saskatchewan in Canada.

system-page.name: ssf
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with the Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund
system-page.summary: Zayed University and Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) at Zayed University headquarters in Abu Dhabi in the presence of His Excellency Salem Saeed AlKhatheri, Chairman of Abu Dhabi Local Depts. Social Security Fund, and Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University.

system-page.name: wbank
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna welcomes World Bank President at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of International Cooperation and Development, President of Zayed University, received and welcomed Dr. Jim Yong Kim, President of the World Bank Group, at Zayed University, Dubai campus on Sunday.

system-page.name: nacada_n
system-page.title: Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb inaugurates NACADA conference at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, inaugurated NACADA conference, the Global Community of Academic Advising, which was held for the first time in Dubai campus on Tuesday.

system-page.name: imf
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi receives Christine Lagarde at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance, President of Zayed University received Madam Christine Lagarde, Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), and her distinguished accompanying delegation at Zayed University in Dubai campus.

system-page.name: shkaFatima
system-page.title: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak receives Her Excellency Lubna Al Qasimi and Zayed University delegation
system-page.summary: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima Bint Mubarak, Chairwoman of the General Women's Union (GWU), Supreme Chairwoman of the Family Development Foundation (FDF) and President of the Supreme Council for Motherhood and Childhood, received Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University. Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna was accompanied by a group of academic and administrative women professionals at Zayed University.

system-page.name: uqrs16
system-page.title: Sheikha Shamma Bint Sultan Bin Khalifa Al Nahyan inaugurates the second annual UAE Quantitative Research Symposium at Zayed University
system-page.summary: The second annual UAE Quantitative Research Symposium was inaugurated on Tuesday at Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus under the patronage and in the presence of ZU alumna, Sheikha Shamma Bint Sultan Bin Khalifa Al Nahyan.

system-page.name: marsh
system-page.title: Zayed University signs MoU with Marsh to empower the Emirati workforce
system-page.summary: Zayed University and Marsh, a global leader in insurance broking and risk management, has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) at Zayed University in Dubai campus in the presence of Robert M. Makhoul, Executive Chairman of Marsh Middle East and North Africa and Professor Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University.

system-page.name: zucf
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates the Climate Change Negotiation Forum at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi
system-page.summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, Climate Change Negotiation Forum ‘The Road from Paris’ commenced today (Wednesday) at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: honor_dist
system-page.title: Zayed University honors 533 distinguished students
system-page.summary: Zayed University (ZU) honored the achievements of 533 of its exceptional, dedicated, and outstanding students in an awarding ceremony held in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses to further reward students for their accomplishments and to encourage them to continue pursuing academic excellence.

system-page.name: Sh_Latifa
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi honors Her Highness Sheikha Latifa Bint Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, honored Her Highness Sheikha Latifa Bint Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice Chairman of the Dubai Culture and Arts Authority and Honorary Chairman of the Zayed University Alumni Association Board, at Zayed University in Dubai campus on Monday in the presence of senior representatives, distinguished guests and ZU alumni.

system-page.name: alya
system-page.title: A Zayed University Alumna underscores an inspiring story of success
system-page.summary: Alya Alyassi, a successful young Emirati woman and Zayed University Alumna, returns back to teach at Zayed University with sincere love and unconditional loyalty to her home, from which she graduated with a Bachelor’s and Master’s Degrees in Communication and Media Sciences.

system-page.name: total

system-page.summary: Zayed University, signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Total, the fourth largest global oil and gas company, at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus as part of its commitment to promote human capital development and build a knowledge sharing culture.

system-page.name: usds_visit
system-page.title: Zayed University welcomes U.S. Undersecretary of State for Public Diplomacy & Public Affairs Richard Stengel
system-page.summary: Zayed University recently welcomed Richard Stengel, U.S. Under-Secretary for Public Diplomacy and Public Affairs who delivered a lecture entitled: "Public Diplomacy and the role of Social Media" to Zayed University students.

system-page.summary: Zayed University displayed an impressive participation and strong presence at the Abu Dhabi International Book Fair held at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre (ADNEC) in the capital.

system-page.name: caceexpo

system-page.summary: His Excellency Sheikh Nahayan Bin Mabarak Al Nahayan, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, and Her Excellency, Sheikha Lubna Bint Khaled Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President at Zayed University, inaugurated the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) exhibition for Zayed University senior students at Manarat Al Saadiyat on Tuesday evening in Abu Dhabi.

system-page.name: fables

system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, honored 11 creative winners in the first of its kind New Fairytales and Fables from the UAE Writing Competition (NF&F) at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus.

system-page.name: globcom

system-page.summary: Zayed University kicked off the 14th annual Global Communication (GlobCom) conference yesterday at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus under the theme of “Building Global Communication Networks for a Cause”.

system-page.name: graduation_2016
system-page.title: His Highness Sheikh Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan attends Zayed University 2016 Graduation ceremony
system-page.summary: His Highness Sheikh Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan said: "The most fascinating success in life is when a person becomes a source of giving; for giving is not only material, but also spiritual and cognitive. To be able to put a smile on people’s faces, this means to teach them something new, renew their faith and strength to achieve what they need to attain."

system-page.name: nbonds

system-page.summary: Zayed University established a new partnership with National Bonds Corporation (NBC), a leading sharia-compliant saving and investments company in the UAE, to enhance capabilities and provide hands-on and experiential learning to students related to major field of studies.

system-page.name: grad_80

system-page.summary: With the growing need for highly trained legal professionals in the UAE and other Gulf States, Zayed University opened its doors for 26 students who wish to hone their skills and acquire the knowledge and competencies necessary for successful handling and dealing with judicial administration.

system-page.name: ewd16

system-page.name: convo16
system-page.title: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Al Qasimi inaugurates the annual convocation at Zayed University
system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, inaugurated the annual convocation yesterday at Zayed University in Abu Dhabi campus under the theme of "Shaping the Future".

system-page.name: deanList16
system-page.title: Zayed University honors 730 distinguished students at the Dean's List ceremony
system-page.summary: Zayed University honored 730 top academic achievers in a special awarding ceremony held on both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses. Distinguished students, who were recognized for exceptional discipline, commitment, and dedication at the ceremony, were on the Dean’s List and met a grade point average (GPA) of 3.60 or above. The breakdown of the students honored is as follows: 405 students in Abu Dhabi campus and 325 in Dubai campus.

system-page.name: karboul

system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, affirmed that Zayed University is proud and privileged to bear the name of the Founding Father of the UAE, the late Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan, who transformed the desert into a green haven.

system-page.name: mentAwareness
system-page.title: Zayed University Promotes Mental Health and Prevents Mental Illness
system-page.summary: Coinciding with the World Mental Health Day, which falls on October 10th every year, Zayed University held a one-day event in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses under the theme "Stop the Stigma of Mental Illness," to raise mental health awareness.

system-page.name: oreal16
system-page.title: L'Oreal-UNESCO For Women in Science Middle East Fellowship 2016 Celebrates Outstanding GCC Women Scientists for Fourth Year Running
system-page.summary: Last night, at an awards ceremony at Zayed University's Convention Center in Dubai, four recipients of this year's prominent L'Oréal-UNESCO for Women in Science Middle East Fellowship were each awarded a generous endowment, of EUR20,000, in support of their outstanding work as women scientists in the Middle East region. Based on the premise "The world needs science, and science needs women, because women in science have the power to change the world", these awards recognize the contributions of Arab women scientists, acknowledging their vital role in furthering development in the region.

system-page.name: h_retreat

system-page.name: najah2016

system-page.summary: Zayed University's booth witnessed hundreds of young students, who familiarized themselves with current bachelor’s and master’s degree programs, which are on offer at the University during the first two days of Najah Education and Training Exhibition and Career Fair in the capital.

system-page.summary: Under the Patronage of Her Excellency, Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, Christopher Pissarides, Regius Professor of Economics at the London School of Economics and Associate at the Center for Economic Performance, gave a lecture to students in an event held at Zayed University’s Abu Dhabi campus.

The exhibition features a display of animation design, graphic design, interior design, and visual arts by 40 students.

Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Chief of the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince's Court, has witnessed this evening’s graduation celebration at Zayed University of 75 exceptional Bachelor’s and Master’s degree students of different specialties from the 2015/2016 school year who achieved the level of "distinction", including 69 Master’s degree students and six Bachelor’s degree students.

system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance and President of Zayed University, stated that the University has aimed, since its establishment, to realize the vision our the wise leadership and its goals of producing exceptional graduates, who are proficient in the language of the current age, in both Arabic and English, and are qualified to work in various roles and occupy leadership positions, to make positive contributions to the development of their communities and families.

system-page.name: UC-meet2017

system-page.summary: Her Excellency Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, Minister of State for Tolerance, President of Zayed University, chaired the second University Council meeting at the University's campus in Dubai recently.

system-page.name: najah2017

system-page.summary: Prof. Reyadh AlMehaideb, Vice President of Zayed University, believes that Zayed University is fully equipped and renowned to deliver graduates to fill leading positions across various sectors in the UAE.

system-page.summary: H.E Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, President of Zayed University, has recently honored two Zayed University students for winning a Furniture Design Contest during a ceremony held at Zayed University Abu Dhabi Campus.

system-page.name: spec-olym

system-page.summary: Students from the College of Communication and Media Sciences (CCMS) at Zayed University concluded their class project by signing up nearly 500 volunteers and contributors to the Special Olympics IX MENA Games scheduled 14-23 March 2018, which will be held in Abu Dhabi.

system-page.name: itti-mus

system-page.summary: Zayed University Organized a student-tour to Etihad Museum in Dubai, starting the university's lined-up activities for the UAE’s 46th National Day.

system-page.name: nd2017

system-page.summary: Zayed University held two massive events in both Abu Dhabi and Dubai campuses to mark the UAE’s 46th National Day celebrations.

system-page.name: sprsem2018

system-page.summary: Zayed University kickstarts the second semester of the academic year 2017-2018, with 500 new undergraduates, including 450 at the bachelor level, 10 international students, and 46 in the Postgraduate Programs.

system-page.name: gend-eq

system-page.summary: Solidarity and equality between men and women as a fundamental right within the UAE, the wise leadership has been highly dedicated to the advancement of gender equality to achieve the highly anticipated national agenda, said H.E Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi, President of Zayed University.

system-page.name: educhain

system-page.summary: H.E Sheikha Lubna bint Khalid Al Qasimi, President of Zayed University, welcomed a California State University-Chico visiting delegation led by counterpart Dr. Gayle Hutchinson, visit aims to collaborate in education enhancement, research and innovation.
